name: Oni Station
description:
You awake alone inside a moving train, your memories of how you got here blurred and missing. At the train control panel, a fuel counter is slowly going down. The only thing that seems certain is a dreadful feeling that something is chasing you, and you don't want the vehicle's fuel to end.

Oni Station is a horror game with roguelike and arcade elements where you must outrun the monster chasing you while carefully planning which stations to stop and search for train fuel. How far will you go?

Get ready to

  • Explore infinite combinations of stations while searching for resources to ensure your survival, such as fuel and batteries.
  • Discover the truth behind the tracks and the creature chasing you, but be careful, time is a resource as well.
  • Compete with other players to see who survived the longest through online leaderboards.
